mapper.update: update mkt_algorithms set ALGO_CODE = #{algoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALGO_NAME = #{algoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDLE_CLASS = #{handleClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALGO_DESC = #{algoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ALGO_ID, ALGO_CODE, ALGO_NAME, HANDLE_CLASS, ALGO_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_algorithms where ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ALGO_ID, ALGO_CODE, ALGO_NAME, HANDLE_CLASS, ALGO_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_algorithms
